info: Owners directly link their bank accounts that match their ID to receive monthly distributions, limiting the chance of fraud.
Condoo user data is encrypted and redundantly hosted on a number of global distributed servers.
All owner funds in our custody are CDIC insured. Condoo is structured to ensure all custodian funds have bankruptcy and deposit protection.
